summary: George Benton returns from school to his brother Jonathan's farm as a doctor and marries his fiance Lory, but happiness doesn't last long.
cast: George Eastman|Ty Hardin|Guido Lollobrigida|Bruno Corazzari|Nello Pazzafini|Laura Troschel|Federico Boido|Roberto Dell'Acqua|Dominic Barto|Lucia Catullo|Manfred Freyberger|Piero Nistri|Bernard Farber|Anita Saxe|Steffen Zacharias|Vittorio Fanfoni|Jean Louis|Angelo Pieri|Claudio Scarchilli|Claudio Trionfi|Franco Ukmar
director: Director: Sergio Garrone (as Willy R. Regan)
title: Quel maledetto giorno della resa dei conti
